original_title: Die Toten Hosen auf Tour - Weil du nur einmal lebst
overview: The German (punk)rock band DIE TOTEN HOSEN is a phenomenon of superlatives. In this music & concert documentary we accompany Germany’s legendary and most successful rock band with 19 millions records sold with unparalleled access on their biggest tour in band history – both in the limelight and backstage with „access all areas“.
title: You Only Live Once: Die Toten Hosen on Tour
